message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000.  I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within our respective comfort zones.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more to make this work.  I'm willing to come down to $9750.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to make a good deal.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I've reviewed my budget again and am able to offer $9600 for the product. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
